info.name: Boshi Email Server API
info.description:
Boshi Server - Email Delivery API
Base URL: http://5.161.194.64:8080

All endpoints require API Key authentication via Bearer token

request.description:
Submit an email for delivery

Rate Limit: 100 requests per minute

Required fields:
- from: Sender email address
- to: Recipient email address
- subject: Email subject
- html: Email body (HTML format)

Optional fields:
- tags: Comma-separated tags
- metadata: Key-value pairs for tracking

Get the delivery status of a specific email

Rate Limit: 100 requests per minute

Path Parameters:
- messageId: The message ID returned from send email request

Response includes:
- messageId: The message identifier
- status: Current delivery status (PENDING, DELIVERED, FAILED, etc.)
- attempts: Number of delivery attempts
- errorMessage: Error details if failed
- deliveredAt: Timestamp when delivered (if applicable)

List all emails with pagination

Rate Limit: 100 requests per minute

Query Parameters:
- page: Page number (default: 1)
- limit: Number of emails per page (default: 20)

Get server-wide email statistics

Rate Limit: 100 requests per minute

Response includes:
- totalReceived: Total emails submitted
- pending: Emails waiting for delivery
- delivered: Successfully delivered emails
- failed: Permanently failed deliveries
- permanentlyFailed: Emails that won't be retried
- uniqueSenders: Count of unique sender addresses
- uniqueRecipients: Count of unique recipient addresses

Diagnostic endpoint to test DNS resolution from within the JVM

Useful for debugging email delivery issues

Path Parameters:
- domain: Domain to test DNS resolution for (e.g., gmail.com, example.com)

Tests performed:
1. System InetAddress resolution
2. dnsjava MX record resolution
3. Java DNS configuration
4. JNDI DNS resolution

Response: Plain text report with detailed diagnostic results
